profileText: a Representative from Georgia; born in Georgia, February 17, 1988; graduated from Woodward Academy, College Park, Ga.; B.A., Pepperdine University, Malibu, Calif., 2010; professional advocate; staff, Republican National Committee, 2011; campaign staff, presidential campaign of Ben Carson, 2016; campaign staff, presidential campaign of Donald J. Trump, 2016; staff, White House Office of Political Affairs, 2017-2021; staff, Speaker of the House Kevin McCarthy of California, 2021-2023; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).
